alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 3:07PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Worcester, southeastern Hampshire, southeastern Franklin and central Hampden Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 306 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Holyoke, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chicopee, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Northampton, West Springfield, Ludlow, South Hadley, Easthampton, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Palmer, Ware, Granby, Southampton, Hadley, Warren, West Brookfield and Hardwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.
